result.eng: He would usually go out on Friday night.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche Aoine
result.orig: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche Aoine
result.html: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche AoineHe would usually go out on Friday night.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leis dul amaċ oíċe AoineHe would usually go out on Friday night.

result.eng: As is usual all over Europe.
result.ga: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.orig: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.html: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.
result.ponchtml: De réir mar is gnáċ ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.

result.eng: I usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ga: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.orig: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.html: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ponchtml: Is gnáċ dom éisteaċt go géar ag na léaċtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.

result.eng: As usual, the bus is late.
result.ga: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.orig: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.html: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhusAs usual, the bus is late.
result.ponchtml: Mar is gnáċ tá moill ar an ḃusAs usual, the bus is late.

result.eng: Immigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ga: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.orig: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.html: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircighImmigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ponchtml: Ní gnáċ Béarla maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag inimirciġImmigrants usually don't speak good English.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.html: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
